last_episode_to_air.name: Person To Prison
last_episode_to_air.overview: Snooper and Blabber go to Sing Song prison disguised as convicts to prevent a jail break. Their attempt only gets them convicted.

name: Snooper and Blabber
overview: Snooper and Blabber is one of the three sequences from The Quick Draw McGraw Show. This show was produced by Hanna-Barbera between September 19, 1959 and October 20, 1962, and consists of 45 episodes.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Snooper and Blabber form a pair of cat and mouse detectives, respectively,[2] working for the Super Snooper Detective Agency. Super Snooper is more or less the one in command whenever the pair takes on a case while Blabber Mouse follows whatever orders Snooper gives him.

episodes.name: Puss n' Booty
episodes.overview: Aloysius the cat hires Snooper and Blabber to capture an imposter working with a disgruntled Butler to rip off his million-dollar inheritance.

episodes.name: Switch Witch
episodes.overview: In Court, Snooper and Blabber testify a witch accused of persecuting Hansel and Gretel.

episodes.name: Real Gone Ghosts
episodes.overview: The Captain of a ship summons Snooper and Blabber to take care of a couple of poltergeists.

episodes.name: Desperate Diamond Dimwits
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber attempt to retrieve the King-Size diamond stolen by the thief Lightfingers.

episodes.name: Big Diaper Caper
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber go to the Evil Scientist residence to babysit a sinister baby.

episodes.name: The Flea and Me
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber search for a missing stage star flea called Rudolf, who proves to be slippery for the detectives.

episodes.name: Disappearing Inc.
episodes.overview: A crook gets hold of an invisibility formula. To catch him, Snooper has Blabber take some of that formula.

episodes.name: Baby Rattled
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber are assigned to guard a safe in a mansion. But when Banypants infiltrates, a cop stands in the detectives' way.

episodes.name: Not So Dummy
episodes.overview: In Goony Island, Snooper and Blabber investigate a robbery, caused by Babypants disguised as a dummy.

episodes.name: Fee-Fi-Fo Fumble
episodes.overview: In hope of earning the Pussyfoot award, Snooper explains his case about a vanished bank and a giant.

episodes.name: Masquerader Raider
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber go to the Grumbles Department store to catch Quick Change Quintin disguising himself as various people.

episodes.name: Motor Knows Best
episodes.overview: Snooper volunteers to beat Crash Smithereens in a car race, while avoiding his cheating tricks.

episodes.name: Slippery Glass Slipper
episodes.overview: Blabber tells a journalist all about his and Snooper's royal case finding the lady who owns a glass slipper.

episodes.name: Monkey Wrenched
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber go to a supermarket to catch an escaped monkey while trying to keep quiet about it.

episodes.name: Gopher Goofers
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber are assigned to remove a pesky gopher from a rich garden. Their every attempt fails.

episodes.name: Impossible Imposters
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber track a mad scientist who has created robot clones of Snooper to give him a criminal name.

episodes.name: Adventure Is My Hobby
episodes.overview: Snooper starring on television explains a case at Lake Wacha Macha Pool where a sea monster dwelled.

episodes.name: Cloudy Rowdy
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber follow the trail of Nimbo Nimbus in his giant skycloud after he stole a precious sapphire.

episodes.name: Snap Happy Saps
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber are hired to take pictures of the creepy Evil Scientist family.

episodes.name: The Lion Is Busy
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber search for the escaped lion Snagglepuss and all three get tangled in the Adventurers' Club.

episodes.name: Laughing Guess
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber try to make Hardy Har Har laugh once again. Only slipping on a banana peel will make the hyena laugh.

episodes.name: The Case Of The Purloined Parrot
episodes.overview: Snooper tells a story about a case, which had Captain Scuttle's parrot snatched, since he knew where to find a lost treasure chest.

episodes.name: Poodle Toodle-Oo!
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber with the help of flea try to track down a runaway poodle. They abort their mission when they see she has a fiance.

episodes.name: Doggone Dog, Gone
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber seek a lost diamond ring. The chase it until Blabber accidentally swallows it.

episodes.name: Hula Hula Hullabaloo
episodes.overview: Snooper is to deliver a ping pong pearl to San Francisco, but it gets eaten by a flying fish.

episodes.name: Wild Man, Wild!
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber tail a wild man on the loose. By the time they find him, he's become civilised and adopted.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Snooper and Blabber form a pair of cat and mouse detectives, respectively,[2] working for the Super Snooper Detective Agency. Super Snooper is more or less the one in command whenever the pair takes on a case while Blabber Mouse follows whatever orders Snooper gives him.

episodes.name: Ala-Kazoop!
episodes.overview: Snooper and an inspector are on the case of a stolen ruby. Blabber possessed by Hypno's powers is after that ruby.

episodes.name: Hop To It
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber chase after a diamond thief hitching a ride in a kangaroo's pouch, who repeatedly stomps on Snooper.

episodes.name: Fleas Be Careful
episodes.overview: Blabber tells all about Snooper's case regarding Toot Sweet trying win the heart of his girlfriend, who was taken by a slick flea.

episodes.name: Observant Servants
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber go undercover to guard a precious tiara, which gets taken by Lightfingers, hiding in a birthday cake.

episodes.name: De-Duck-Tives
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber are sent to hunt a Tralfazian duck, but a duckling pesters them thinking their duck decoy is his mother.

episodes.name: Big Shot Blab
episodes.overview: Blabber eats a peanut which is a high atomic explosive entrusted to Snooper by a scientist. Then he gives Snooper a hard time.

episodes.name: Big Cat Caper
episodes.overview: Before Snooper can send Snagglepuss to the zoo, he escapes. Snooper and Blabber chase the lion through the city park.

episodes.name: Scoop Snoop
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber travel to the Himilayas to photograph an abominable snowman. Blabber gets successful photo shots.

episodes.name: Prince of a Fella'
episodes.overview: The Wickedonia Queen sends Snooper and Blabber to find Snow White. Instead they have her meet Prince Charming and turn into frogs.

episodes.name: Flea For All
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber follow a diamond theft to Scratchit's flea circus. Snooper then gets Toots Sweet to infiltrate the flea circus.

episodes.name: Outer Space Case
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber are taken to Mars to catch a thieving astronaut monkey. The case ends with Blabber staying behind.

episodes.name: Bear-ly Able
episodes.overview: The Bear Family request Snooper and Blabber to find the thief who stole their porridge, who is none other than the big bad wolf.

episodes.name: Surprised Party
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber go to the Evil Scientist residence to hold a party for their baby, who puts them into a lot of danger.

episodes.name: Zoom-Zoom Blabber
episodes.overview: The Captain Zoom-Zoom actor asks Snooper to catch Fly Burglar. Blabber uses Zoom-Zoom's identity to protect a precious sapphire.

episodes.name: Eenie Genie Minie Moo!
episodes.overview: Blabber with the role of detective goes with Snooper to recover Aladdin's genie. A long chase eventually gets the genie caught.

episodes.name: Bronco Bluster
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber try to find a wild runaway horse. Snooper sends him home to Texas instead of Madison Round Garden.

episodes.name: Chilly Chiller
episodes.overview: A ghost requests Snooper and Blabber to remove the Evil Scientist family from his house, but their attempts fail.

episodes.name: Gem Jams
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber try to find Mr. Richley's stolen gems, the butler as the prime suspect, who used shrinking potion to swipe them.

episodes.name: Person To Prison
episodes.overview: Snooper and Blabber go to Sing Song prison disguised as convicts to prevent a jail break. Their attempt only gets them convicted.
